entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burns Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burns Lake Airport 07:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: ESE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain over southern sections early this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
